trends: There have been no other sightings in Catawissa
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Rose up from ground very slowly hovered for about 10 minutes then flew away really fast.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was back the hall on my computer checking my mail and my uncle came in from smoking and said "there is a UFO floating in the distance". my instincts kicked in and i said i didnt believe him but i went to look anyway i took my binoculars just in case. when i stepped onto the porch i saw a disc shaped object floating in the distance flashing the colors: red, blue, yellow, orange, green, and purple. i took a picture of it with a disposable camera then went down into my basement to get a telescope by the time i got out there it started to fly off and it was faster than a jet and i know how fast a jet is they ply past my house every now and then. by the time i got my telescope set up it was gone it went behind the trees on the mountain next to us. 2 of my uncles has now seen a UFO and i had always personally beleived in UFO's and i saw it i was excited i was really sorry i didnt have a video camera. by the way we heard no sound coming from it as it was flying away
